name: Attack of the Dead
summary: The world’s never been the same since the zombie outbreak occurred. Your average life turned into an endless fight for survival. But you became strong - So strong that the people around you call you “Lioness.” You managed to make a living as a soldier in a small community of survivors and your latest mission is to secure a supply of food. But things go south and the zombies attack! Just when you think you’re a goner, a mysterious figure wielding two knives takes out all of the zombies in front of you…
